Patients stratify disease status , performance status , participate institution . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive cisplatin IV 30-120 minute day 1 fluorouracil IV 96 hour day 1-4 . Courses repeat every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Arm II : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 3 hour follow cisplatin IV 30-120 minute day 1 . Courses repeat every 3 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Treatment continue 2 course past complete response ( minimum 6 course ) . Patients stable disease may discontinue treatment 6 course . Patients follow every 3 month disease progression .
